name: Crystal Ball (Samtastic)
description:
Welcome to the Crystal Ball game! A simple interactive game that randomises answers to your ‘yes or no’ questions! Based on the game from the Google Assistant, the Crystal Ball will predict your future with a selection of random responses! The game starts with an interactive menu on which you can change the voice and its personality. You can choose if you want the voice to whisper or to speak normally to you like Alexa!  Do you dare to ask it another question? What are you waiting for? Download this game to find out your future!

Note: not all voices have this whisper mode feature – only the named voices and Australian voice does
